analyzed: 'on kyang phyag g-yas na rdo rje dang khab bsnams pa /
translated: However, she holds a vajra and a staff in her right hand,

original: g-yon na zhags pa dang / mya ngan med pa'i shing bsnams pa /
analyzed: g-yon na zhags pa dang / mya ngan med pa'i shing bsnams pa /
translated: and a noose and an aśoka branch in her left.

original: gdug pa can rnams rengs par byed pa nub tu dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: gdug pa can rnams rengs par byed pa nub tu dgod par bya'o //
translated: She paralyzes the wicked. She should be placed in the west.

original: aom m'a r'i tsyee batt'a li ba d'a li ba r'a li b'a r'a h'a mu khi sarba satv'a na me ba sha ma n'a ya ho:sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom m'a r'i tsyee batt'a li ba d'a li ba r'a li b'a r'a h'a mu khi sarba satv'a na me ba sha ma n'a ya ho:sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ māracryā baddāli bādāli varāli varāhamukhi sarvasattvānāṃ me vaśaṃ kuru hoḥ svāhā.

original: zhes pa'i sngags kyis lha mo phag zhal ma sku mdog dmar mo de bzhin du gos dang rgyan dang / yang phyag g-yas na rdo rje dang / mda' bsnams pa /
analyzed: zhes pa'i sngags kyis lha mo phag zhal ma sku mdog dmar mo de bzhin du gos dang rgyan dang / yang phyag g-yas na rdo rje dang / mda' bsnams pa /
translated: With this mantra, the goddess Pig Face is red, similarly dressed and adorned, and also holds a vajra and an arrow in her right hand,

original: g-yon na mya ngan med pa'i shing dang gzhu bsnams pa sems can thams cad rjes su chags par byed pa can byang phyogs su blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: g-yon na mya ngan med pa'i shing dang gzhu bsnams pa sems can thams cad rjes su chags par byed pa can byang phyogs su blta bar bya'o //
translated: and an aśoka branch and a bow in her left. She causes all sentient beings to be attracted. She should face north.

original: de nas lcags kyu la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams dang / de'i sngags kyis kyang dgug pa la sogs pa bya'o //
analyzed: de nas lcags kyu la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams dang / de'i sngags kyis kyang dgug pa la sogs pa bya'o //
translated: Then, with the mudras of the iron hook and so forth and their mantras, one should summon and so forth.

original: ye shes sems dpa' dgug pa dang / rab tu gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya bas bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa' dgug pa dang / rab tu gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya bas bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: One should accomplish the invocation of the gnosis being, the full entrance, the binding, and the control.

original: mdzub mo lcags kyu bcings la /
analyzed: mdzub mo lcags kyu bcings la /
translated: Having formed the hook of the index finger,

original: mthe'u chung lcags kyu chen po ste /
analyzed: mthe'u chung lcags kyu chen po ste /
translated: the great hook of the little finger,

original: tshigs mang po'i rtse mo dag lcags sgrog rgyab tu btsir ba la sogs pas /
analyzed: tshigs mang po'i rtse mo dag lcags sgrog rgyab tu btsir ba la sogs pas /
translated: and the chain of the tips of the many joints,

original: aom badzra aam ku sha dza:zhes pa 'dis ye shes sems dpa' mdun du gdan drangs nas mchod pa la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: aom badzra aam ku sha dza:zhes pa 'dis ye shes sems dpa' mdun du gdan drangs nas mchod pa la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o //
translated: with “Oṃ vajra aṅkuśa jaḥ,” one should invite the gnosis being in front and offer worship, and so on.

original: 'od zer can gyi phyag rgyas de nas aom badzra p'a sha h'um 'dis gzhug par bya'o / aom badzra spho ta pam 'dis bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'od zer can gyi phyag rgyas de nas aom badzra p'a sha h'um 'dis gzhug par bya'o / aom badzra spho ta pam 'dis bcing bar bya'o //
translated: Then, with the mudra of Māmakī and “Oṃ vajra pāśa hūṃ,” one should draw in; with “Oṃ vajra sphoṭa vaṃ,” one should bind;

original: aom badzra a'a be sha ho:'dis mnyes par bya'o //
analyzed: aom badzra a'a be sha ho:'dis mnyes par bya'o //
translated: and with “Oṃ vajra āveśa hoḥ,” one should please.

original: de nas dam tshig gi lha rnams kyis lhan cig tu gnyis su med par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas dam tshig gi lha rnams kyis lhan cig tu gnyis su med par bya'o //
translated: Then, one should make the pledge beings and the gnosis beings inseparable.

original: de la 'di'i phyag rgya ni /
analyzed: de la 'di'i phyag rgya ni /
translated: The mudra for that is as follows:

original: lag pa gnyis po mnyam byas nas //
analyzed: lag pa gnyis po mnyam byas nas //
translated: Having made the two hands even,

original: thal mo'i rnam par bsres bya ste //
analyzed: thal mo'i rnam par bsres bya ste //
translated: The palms are joined in the form of a hollow space,

original: mtheb chen dang ni ming med kyi //🔽rtse mo gnyis po bye ba yis //
analyzed: mtheb chen dang ni ming med kyi // rtse mo gnyis po bye ba yis //
translated: with the tips of the thumbs and the ring fingers🔽opened up.🔽The middle fingers are wrapped around

original: gung mo'i sor mo yang dag 'khyud //
analyzed: gung mo'i sor mo yang dag 'khyud //
translated: the two thumbs.

original: 'khyil pa'i rnam par bcings pa dag / skyil krung steng du nyer bzhag nas //
analyzed: 'khyil pa'i rnam par bcings pa dag / skyil krung steng du nyer bzhag nas //
translated: The mudra of the crossed vajra is placed on the crossed legs,

original: lte ba'i phyogs su dgod par bya //
analyzed: lte ba'i phyogs su dgod par bya //
translated: and it is placed at the navel.

original: rab mchog phyag rgya 'di yis ni //
analyzed: rab mchog phyag rgya 'di yis ni //
translated: This supreme mudra

original: las rnams kun la legs par sbyor //
analyzed: las rnams kun la legs par sbyor //
translated: is applied well to all activities.

original: @175a * // de nas dbang bskur ba blang bar bya ste /
analyzed: @175a * // de nas dbang bskur ba blang bar bya ste /
translated: Then one should take the empowerment:

original: phyag rgya chen po ni mtheb chen sems dpa'i skyil krung bkug nas mdzub mo'i rtse mo bzung ste /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po ni mtheb chen sems dpa'i skyil krung bkug nas mdzub mo'i rtse mo bzung ste /
translated: The great mudra is the thumbs crossed in the bodhisattva posture, holding the tips of the index fingers.🔽The middle fingers are the syllable oṃ. The remaining fingers are in vajra-folded-palms añjali.

original: 'di'i gung mo aom yig lhag ma rdo rje thal mo sbyar ba spyi bor bkod nas aom bhu:kham mam zhes pa dbang bskur ba'i sngags kyis rnam par snang mdzad gser gyi mdog lta bu byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas bzhugs pa /
analyzed: 'di'i gung mo aom yig lhag ma rdo rje thal mo sbyar ba spyi bor bkod nas aom bhu:kham mam zhes pa dbang bskur ba'i sngags kyis rnam par snang mdzad gser gyi mdog lta bu byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas bzhugs pa /
translated: Having placed this at the crown, recite the empowerment mantra oṃ bhūḥ khaṃ maṃ and imagine that Vairocana, the color of gold, is seated in the gesture of supreme enlightenment.

original: spyi bor aom bsams nas bsgoms pas ngal na sngags bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: spyi bor aom bsams nas bsgoms pas ngal na sngags bzlas par bya'o //
translated: Visualizing the syllable Oṃ on the crown of one’s head, one should meditate. When tired, one should recite the mantra.

original: rang gi snying gar zla ba la gnas pa'i sngags 'bar zhing 'bar ba dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi snying gar zla ba la gnas pa'i sngags 'bar zhing 'bar ba dang ldan pa'o //
translated: In one’s heart, on a moon, is the mantra, blazing and radiant.

original: aom m'a r'i tsyee m'am sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom m'a r'i tsyee m'am sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ māri cye māṃ svāhā.

original: zhes bltas la bzlas pa bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bltas la bzlas pa bya'o //
translated: One should recite the mantra while looking at it.

original: ji ltar nus pa'i bsgom pa sngon du 'gro bas lha mo thams cad yang dag par rgyal bar blta zhing sngags bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar nus pa'i bsgom pa sngon du 'gro bas lha mo thams cad yang dag par rgyal bar blta zhing sngags bzlas par bya'o //
translated: Having first meditated as much as one can, one should recite the mantra while looking at all the goddesses.

original: phyi nas chad lhag bskang pa'i cho ga yi ge brgya pas kha bskang bar bya'o //🔽aom badzra satva sa ma ya /🔽ma nu p'a la ya /🔽badzra satva tve no pa tishtha /🔽dro dho me bha ba /
analyzed: phyi nas chad lhag bskang pa'i cho ga yi ge brgya pas kha bskang bar bya'o // aom badzra satva sa ma ya / ma nu p'a la ya / badzra satva tve no pa tishtha / dro dho me bha ba /
translated: Afterwards, one should make up for any deficiencies in the ritual by reciting the hundred-syllable mantra.

original: su toshyo me bha ba /🔽su po shyo me bha ba /🔽aa nu rakto me bha ba /🔽sarba siddhim me pra yatstsha sarba karma su tsa me tsittam shre ya:ku ru h'um /
analyzed: su toshyo me bha ba / su po shyo me bha ba / aa nu rakto me bha ba / sarba siddhim me pra yatstsha sarba karma su tsa me tsittam shre ya:ku ru h'um /
translated: Oṃ vajrasattva samayam anupālaya vajrasattva tvenopatiṣṭha dṛḍho me bhava sutoṣyo me bhava anurakto me bhava supoṣyo me bhava sarvasiddhiṃ me prayaccha sarvakarmaṣu ca me cittaṃ śreyaḥ kuru hūṃ ha ha ha ha ho

original: ha ha ha ha ho /
analyzed: ha ha ha ha ho /
translated: bhagavān vajrasattva āḥ.

original: bha ga b'a na sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra m'a me munytsa badzr'i bha ba ma h'a sa ma ya satva a'a: 'dis dus thams cad du gshegs su gsol zhing dge ba yongs su bsngo zhing mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub zhus te rang gi phyag rgya spyi
analyzed: bha ga b'a na sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra m'a me munytsa badzr'i bha ba ma h'a sa ma ya satva a'a: 'dis dus thams cad du gshegs su gsol zhing dge ba yongs su bsngo zhing mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub zhus te rang gi phyag rgya spyi
translated: Bhagavān sarvatathāgatavajra mā me muñca vajrī bhava mahāsamayasattva āḥ.

original: bor bkrol nas aom m'a r'i tsyee mu:zhes so //
analyzed: bor bkrol nas aom m'a r'i tsyee mu:zhes so //
translated: With this, one should request the departure at all times, dedicate the virtue, request the desired spiritual power, and release one's own seal on the crown of one's head, saying Oṃ māri cye muḥ.

original: rang gi lhag pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor gyis zas dang khrus dang / nyal ba la sogs pa thams cad du rab tu brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi lhag pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor gyis zas dang khrus dang / nyal ba la sogs pa thams cad du rab tu brtag par bya'o //
translated: One should always imagine with the yoga of one's own special deity all activities such as eating, bathing, sleeping, and so forth.

original: de'i phyir rim pa 'dis lus ngag yid gsum bsrung bar byas nas ci bder gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir rim pa 'dis lus ngag yid gsum bsrung bar byas nas ci bder gnas par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, having protected body, speech, and mind in this sequence, one should remain as one pleases.

original: 'phags ma'i sgrub thabs byas pa yis //
analyzed: 'phags ma'i sgrub thabs byas pa yis //
translated: By the composition of this Ārya Tārā sādhana,

original: dge ba nyer bsags gang de yis //
analyzed: dge ba nyer bsags gang de yis //
translated: whatever virtue has been well-accumulated by me,🔽may it be the cause for all beings to attain

original: ye shes dri med 'od zer can //
analyzed: ye shes dri med 'od zer can //
translated: the stainless light of wisdom.

original: skye bos go 'phang thob par shog / aom kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi grihna grihna tu sarba bh'u ta k'i ba li ma ma sh'antim kum ru bandhu sv'a h'a /
analyzed: skye bos go 'phang thob par shog / aom kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi grihna grihna tu sarba bh'u ta k'i ba li ma ma sh'antim kum ru bandhu sv'a h'a /
translated: Om, kha kha khahi khahi, grihni grihni, sarva bhūta kavalita mama śāntim kuru bandhu svāhā.

original: zhes pa'i sngags kyis gtor ma 'bul lo //
analyzed: zhes pa'i sngags kyis gtor ma 'bul lo //
translated: With this mantra, offer the torma.

original: rtog pa las gsungs pa'i 'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
analyzed: rtog pa las gsungs pa'i 'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
translated: The practice of Marici as taught in the tantra is complete.

original: // / pandi ta slob dpon snying po'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa'o//
analyzed: // / pandi ta slob dpon snying po'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa'o//
translated: This was composed by the paṇḍita-ācārya-garbhāṇīpada.
